title: Alpha Recovery Corporation Hires Roxanne Bartley as Vice President of Business Development
text:
DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Alpha Recovery Corp announced today that Roxanne Bartley has joined their team as Vice President of Business Development. Bartley has twenty three years of experience in the ARM industry, having assisted organizations with all aspects of their sales and marketing strategies. This announcement comes as Alpha deepens its talent pool to compete in new markets.
Bartley said, “After successfully consulting independently over the past twelve years, I am excited to rejoin an entrepreneurial team which has demonstrated a strong commitment to its employees, clients and collaborators in principles and performance. Alpha Recovery has excelled in its representation of debt buyers and credit issuers across a multitude of asset classes; I look forward to increasing their brand awareness among credit issuers and driving growth.”
Prior to founding Bartley Ventures LLC in 2006, she served as VP of Sales for DebtResolve, KCA Financial Services and Harris and Harris Ltd., helping each organization to achieve organic growth, expand into new verticals, and increase shareholder value.
She is deeply committed to the Caribbean community to which she belongs and has facilitated diversity initiatives in Hillsborough County, FL and the Caribbean diaspora. She will continue to reside in Tampa, FL with her two sons.
John Curry, Co-Owner of Alpha Recovery Corp said, “We are very happy to have Ms. Bartley join our team. She brings many years of experience, knowledge, diversity and a great reputation to our organization. We look forward to Roxanne expanding our footprint and increasing our growth. She will join our executive team in representing Alpha at the upcoming LendIt Fintech USA Conference in San Francisco, CA April 9-11 Booth #1748
About Alpha Recovery Corp
Alpha Recovery Corp is a full service accounts receivable management (ARM) firm based in Centennial, CO with a satellite office in Tempe, AZ. Its executive team has a combined 90 years of ARM experience in contingency collections, consulting, asset sales and purchasing. For more information about Alpha Recovery Corp's services visit www.alpharecoverycorp.com
